H0.text: According to Greek legend, which sorceress helped Jason to find the golden fleece and became his wife. Circe

H1.text: According to Greek legend, which sorceress helped Jason to find the golden fleece and became his wife. Hecate

H2.text: According to Greek legend, which sorceress helped Jason to find the golden fleece and became his wife. Artemis

H3.text: According to Greek legend, which sorceress helped Jason to find the golden fleece and became his wife. Medea

A4.text: Medea provided an ointment that protected Jason from the oxen's flames.

A5.text: Medea aided Jason in his tasks by giving him a potion to make the dragon fall asleep.
